title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2602.3 - Neighborhood population
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2602.3 - Neighborhood population

State Regulations
A substantial proportion of the residential population of
the neighborhood must be persons of low income, and may include special
population groups with unmet housing needs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2602.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
